name: Flesh to Stone

components.material: a pinch of lime, water, and earth

description: You attempt to turn one creature that you can see within range into stone. If the targetâ€™s body is made of flesh, it must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is Restrained as its flesh begins to harden. On a successful save, the spell ends. If the target is Restrained by this spell, it must make another Constitution saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the spell ends. On a failure, the creature is Petrified until the spell ends.
